triples.name: Multi-agent learning
triples.relevance: Core topic: survey focuses on multi-agent deep reinforcement learning methods and emergent behaviors

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Primary technique reviewed: combines deep learning with reinforcement learning for training agents

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Foundational learning paradigm that underpins all multi-agent and deep RL approaches discussed

triples.name: Cooperative game theory
triples.relevance: Framework for analyzing cooperative multi-agent scenarios where agents work together

triples.name: Non-cooperative game theory
triples.relevance: Framework for analyzing competitive multi-agent scenarios where agents have opposed interests
